item.description:
Two 50% off scholarships made available by a generous patron on a first come first serve basis. There are 6 Spots left for this Saturday's Workshop.

FUNdamentals of Rawfood Diet and Recipes
with Chef Rawbert, founder of Organic Garden Cafe
Call 978/922-0004 to reserve your spot
 
When: Saturday, May 21st,2011, From 10am to 2:30 pm  only

Where: Franson Family Chiropractic, 100 Cummings Center (on Rte 62), Suite 101D, Beverly, MA

How Much: $125.00

This 4 hour workshop includes not one but 2 meals, a green smoothie sample and a 2-minute brownie!  Plus networking opportunities.

EVENT ALSO INCLUDES a 20 page handout summarizing principles of raw health, digestion, food combining, etc, PLUS over a dozen of Rawbert's best recipes!

* Raw Nutrition Basics
* Understanding Detox, Basic Cleansing Programs
* Alkalizing the body with alkaline foods
* Over a half dozen recipes prepared at this workshop
* Green Juices & Smoothies - all you need to know about every aspect of making delicious healing green smoothies!
* Soups, sauces, salads & spreads - including our Beanless Hummus, a simple Asian salad you can make in 5 minutes, and 3 dressings!
* Tips for simple raw meal planning and breakfast

Take a 7-Day, 14-day or 21-Day Raw Challenge with a support group(s) that will be created at this workshop.

SurTHRIVE using the recipes you'll learn here!

http://www.organicgardencafe.com
item.name: FUNdamentals of Rawfood With Chef Rawbert
